title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: iloid and escape the hell. Unmissable Storyline achievement. Devil's in the Details Defeat Commander Zhalk in the Nautiloid. Missable Strike the last blow against Commander Zhalk in the Prologue. She Cannot be Caged! Rescue Sazza from the Emerald Grove, Goblin Camp, and Moonrise Towers in one playthrough. Missable You Have Two Hands for a Reason Pet Scratch and the Owlbear cub at the same time - the greatest joy an adventurer could ask for. Missable will not unlock if "Speak with Animals" is act
